```{r 드라이브}
drive_auth()
#drive_ls("2022_03/data",  pattern="train_input") %>% View(title="train")
drv_id = drive_ls("2022_03/data",  pattern="train_input") $id
file_ls = drive_ls(path = as_id(drv_id))
file_ls %<>% arrange(name)

for (i in 1:nrow(file_ls)){
    drive_download(as_id(file_ls[i,]), overwrite = TRUE)
    assign(paste0("dt",i), fread(file_ls$name[i],  encoding="UTF-8" ))
  cat("\n",i)
}

ls()


dt1 %>%  head %>% View("dt1")
dt2 %>% head %>% View("dt12")

```
